snippet: The tax-free status of municipal bonds is likely to become even more appealing this year, as new tax rules go into effect.
abstract: Municipal bonds have been depressed, but their tax-free status is likely to become even more appealing in 2014, as new tax rules go into effect; munis are seen as especially good for well-off people past 70 1/2, who are required to take minimum distributions from their retirement plans.
lead_paragraph: The tax-free status of municipal bonds is likely to become even more appealing this year, as new tax rules go into effect.

headline.main: After Setbacks, Municipal Bond Sector Is Looking Up
headline.print_headline: After Setbacks, Municipal Bond Sector Is Looking Up
